Only reason I decided to post a wanted ad is because 80% of the ads on here are scams and scammers won’t meet or communicate over the phone. So everyone, beware. Looking to move at the end of July. Thank you for your time. We are looking for host families for the following dates: I am a 51 year old I am looking for a private room or a room shared with another . I have until July 16th to find another room to rent and move out, however my current roommate is a paranoid schizophrenic and is driving me crazy. If I move out earlier, my landlord will not care. I am currently disabled and on SSI. I have no pets, but I don't mind if you do. I do not drink, do drugs, or smoke. I have sleep apnea and a CPAP machine but might still snore, so my roommate should be okay with it. Shared bathroom is OK. I have dietary restrictions due to diabetes, so I do require kitchen privileges of some sort. I am quiet and will clean up after myself. Looking to rent a furnished room, $500 including utilities. Trying to stick to the Inland Empire (San Bernardino-Redlands-Loma Linda-Highland-Rialto-Yucaipa and adjoining areas) for housing as that's where I get my health services. Prefer housemates, but will consider f I don't share a room with them. The focal point of this home is its expansive living area that was completely reimagined by the current owners. The upgrades include a brand new kitchen island/dry bar area that has ample storage for all your entertaining needs as well as modifications to the living space to take advantage of its size, creating a true home. The windowed kitchen just off the dining area is perfectly situated between both bedrooms creating ideal separation of space and privacy. The thoughtfully renovated kitchen comes fully equipped with top of the line stainless steel appliances and is beautifully adorned with quartz countertops and tasteful modern tile backsplash. Adjoining the kitchen is the perk of a windowed powder room, which is set perfectly next to some additional storage captured during the renovation. Unwind after a long day in the oversized and airy primary bedroom with its own ensuite bath with full soaking tub. This room has two oversized windows allowing endless sunlight to pour in from its south and east exposures. A wall of custom built in closets maximizes the use of space. The second bedroom can double as a home office with a new custom closet that has been added. The two windows are a welcoming touch to this sunlit room. This unique, huge, corner 1 bedroom suite cant be missed. The living room, fully lined with windows on two sides looks out over the trees of Roslyn Road. Fabulously maintained details date back to the early 1900s, keeping the heritage feel of the building like you are in a time capsule. Best of all, this building is located in the heart of Osborne Village. Steps away from Winnipeg's most vibrant neighborhood, you have access to the best of Winnipeg's eclectic community.The basics like Safeway, Shoppers Drugmart and Shell are just steps away, yet all the adventure of famous restaurants, lounges and boutique shops are just around the corner.."

I have a gf but we don’t plan on living together for awhile. Credit is so so 700 ish. Im 420 friendly and work in cannabis industry. I don’t drink but don’t care if you do. Im laid back more introverted but can be social. Just want something chill and close by my kids.
Quiet, pleasant, humorous...that's me! I'm about to turn 70 in July, and find myself looking for a new home because this one has been sold. I'm a semi-retired graphic artist who needs a space to turn into a home.
My deadline here to move is July 25th.
I am fully mobile with no physical restrictions, except for being 6'1...ha. Keep to myself but I'm friendly.
My FICA score is 836. I have no debt. No evictions., smoking, pets, drums. Own a car. I have all my own teeth and furnishings. Will also take care of the yard. Love gardening.
I'd prefer something like a studio, with enclosed bath, hopefully own entrance. I promise I'm a great tenant. Honest.
My budget is about $995 including utilities. Definitely need wifi. No problem paying first/last or deposit. Of course I will verify that any ads I answer are real and not a scammer. All transactions in person.
Thank you VERY much if you've read this far. Would love to hear from you.
Hello!
I’m a looking for a room in a house or an in-law suite for September 1, 2022 (or mid-August) for 1-year in a chill, earthy housing environment with like minded folks (prefer trans/nb, women) who appreciate community, connections, and peacefulness.
I am a 30 year old non-binary femme starting a one-year graduate program at the University of Redlands on scholarship— moving from Portland, Oregon to California. When I’m not in class or in the lab/library studying, I am working full-time remote on renewable energy projects or involved with hobbies like foraging, bike packing/camping, and learning different trade skills.
A little bit about what I’m looking for—
*a room for rent or a mother-in-law suite from/with community-oriented people. Prefer women and non-binary/trans folxs.
*allows one dog and you have pets of your own on the property. My Australian shepherd is beta, trained, and excellent with cats, dogs, farm animals, kids and humans alike.
* I can provide multiple contacts for references for my dog and myself
**preferably a garden, pets, and chickens I could tend to
** preferably furnished with a kitchen
** looking for one hour commute radius around Redlands
I have very little time left and need to find a room to rent IMMEDIATELY this is now an emergency... im hoping a kind genuine soul will see this because I might not have a home by the end of today thanks to a two-faced lying toxic shady sociopath on here who said his name was Anthony in Chino Hills. Be careful everyone... And anybody kind that can help out in any way please contact me asap. Thank you for your time, be safe everyone
Hello my name is Natalie Morales I am a 44-year-old  looking to rent a room with a bathroom please no roommates I am in healthcare and I have no pets I don’t drink I don’t smoke I need immediate housing Single mother with one child looking for a house or apartment under $1300 in the city of San Bernardino. Preferably, a 2 bedroom in a quiet neighborhood. Yes, there are cheaper/affordable apartments available in SB, but the areas not so great and rowdy. Only reason I’m still looking for a place in the city of SB is because my daughter goes to a really good magnet school. Also, need a quiet neighborhood with not so much foot traffic and rowdy dogs as I am a professional who works from home.
If you or anyone you know is renting a back house, single house, or apartment, please contact me via email with NAME, PHONE CONTACT, & PROPERTY INFO. I will give you a call. I don’t communicate through text or emails, so if you respond via email with no name and phone contact for me to call, don’t bother. Only reason I decided to post a wanted ad is because 80% of the ads on here are scams and scammers won’t meet or communicate over the phone. So everyone, beware.
Looking to move at the end of July. Thank you for your time.
We are looking for host families for the following dates:
I am a 51 year old  I am looking for a private room or a room shared with another . I have until July 16th to find another room to rent and move out, however my current roommate is a paranoid schizophrenic and is driving me crazy. If I move out earlier, my landlord will not care. I am currently disabled and on SSI. I have no pets, but I don't mind if you do. I do not drink, do drugs, or smoke. I have sleep apnea and a CPAP machine but might still snore, so my roommate should be okay with it. Shared bathroom is OK. I have dietary restrictions due to diabetes, so I do require kitchen privileges of some sort. I am quiet and will clean up after myself. Looking to rent a furnished room, $500 including utilities. Trying to stick to the Inland Empire (San Bernardino-Redlands-Loma Linda-Highland-Rialto-Yucaipa and adjoining areas) for housing as that's where I get my health services. Prefer  housemates, but will consider f I don't share a room with them.
The focal point of this home is its expansive living area that was completely reimagined by the current owners. The upgrades include a brand new kitchen island/dry bar area that has ample storage for all your entertaining needs as well as modifications to the living space to take advantage of its size, creating a true home. The windowed kitchen just off the dining area is perfectly situated between both bedrooms creating ideal separation of space and privacy. The thoughtfully renovated kitchen comes fully equipped with top of the line stainless steel appliances and is beautifully adorned with quartz countertops and tasteful modern tile backsplash. Adjoining the kitchen is the perk of a windowed powder room, which is set perfectly next to some additional storage captured during the renovation.
Unwind after a long day in the oversized and airy primary bedroom with its own ensuite bath with full soaking tub. This room has two oversized windows allowing endless sunlight to pour in from its south and east exposures. A wall of custom built in closets maximizes the use of space. The second bedroom can double as a home office with a new custom closet that has been added. The two windows are a welcoming touch to this sunlit room.
This unique, huge, corner 1 bedroom suite cant be missed. The living room, fully lined with windows on two sides looks out over the trees of Roslyn Road. Fabulously maintained details date back to the early 1900s, keeping the heritage feel of the building like you are in a time capsule.

description:
Now available for rent! 2012 poplar is indeed a coveted rarity with over 3,000 square feet of light-filled, gracious living space, in the heart of a thriving art museum neighborhood. A free-standing home with a stately presence, this four bedroom, 4.5 bath gem boasts expansively-proportioned rooms, high ceilings, and open-concept city living at its finest. The main live space is warm and comfortable, with striking hardwood floors, elegant crown molding, recessed lighting, and a peak through to the lush green from the stunning garden at the rear of the home. The european-style kitchen is absolutely the focal point of the first floor. Custom cabinetry, classic white marble countertops, stainless appliances including a beautiful aga range, farmhouse sink, convenient breakfast bar, and statement pendant lighting. The spacious dining room boasts gorgeous views of the garden, a private, fully enclosed oasis of lush landscaping and year round enjoyment. A convenient powder room completes the first floor of this lovely home. Upstairs, a large and light-filled owner's suite sits at the front of floor two, which boasts the same striking hardwood flooring. Plentiful closets and an elegant marble bath with dual sink and oversized shower. A second spacious bedroom and full bath complete this floor. 2012 offers unique flexibility, as floor three of the home boasts a third expansive bedroom which might also be an owner's suite. A fourth classic bedroom and a full bath, and those gorgeous hardwood floors complete the third floor. Up a quick flight to sweeping panoramic city skyline views and tremendous open-air entertainment space from the fabulous rooftop deck. Expanding the home's value exponentially, the lower level is completely and beautifully finished, replete with a higher ceiling, comfortable living area, spacious bedroom and full bath, excellent storage, and laundry. And yes, those stunning hardwood floors! Simply an exceptional, loved property in every way, in a walkable neighborhood surrounded by art and culture, fine and casual dining, shopping, easy access to transportation, the schuylkill river trail, fairmount park, and so much more. A unique opportunity for a very special home.

title: Start the summer in this philadelphia
description:
Start the summer in this philadelphia chapter landmark property originally designed in 1951! Enter through the spacious remodeled lobby where you are greeted by a 24 hour front desk attendant. The property features a fitness center on the lower level along with common areas where you can relax and watch tv or catch up with friends with a game of pool. There's also a place to store your bike in the designated bike room. Looking for outdoor space? There's a roof deck that offers panoramic views of the city! The views are simply breathtaking! This large north and east facing corner two bedroom has beautiful hardwood parquet floors and a view you will love! The living area and bedrooms are spacious and have tons of closet space. Monthly rent includes cooking gas, and hot and cold water! Super pet friendly!! Come see what all the buzz is about at the parkway house and everything that living in the art museum area has to offer!! ***pictures featured are of the new model unit.***
2201 pennsylvania ave #1209,

title: Looking for a third roommate !
description:
Hi everyone! Two roommates are looking for someone to fill a bedroom in our East Kensington apartment. We’ve lived here just about a year, and it’s been great. There’s plenty of space, a giant roof deck, and it’s only a block away from the York/Dauphin stop on the El, so getting around the city is super easy. Parking is never a problem either. The open bedroom is on the first floor and has a cute balcony. Your bathroom is right outside the bedroom. Rent is $1000 a month + utilities so altogether it’s ~$1000. Move in would be July 1, but we can try and work with you if you’re looking to make an earlier move.
About us: We are two young professionals in our twenties! Mollie is a teacher and MaryBeth works at a local radio station. Mollie loves to bake so we always have plenty of cookies to try ;) We also have a cat named Uno, so no new pets!

description:

The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to shopping, dining, and more! Go grocery shopping at the Rittenhouse Market, Trader Joe's, Giant, Target, or Di Bruno Bros. Browse the books at Barnes & Noble. Shop at the retail stores on Rittenhouse Row such as Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Madewell, and Paper Source. Experience fine dining at Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, or Pietro's. Savor a coffee at La Colombe or Ultimo. Have a French dessert at Miel Patisserie. title: Close to UPENN! Fitler Sq 3 bed 2 bath home with W/D, patio & more!
description:
515 S. 27th Street
This 4 story Fitler Square Home is a gem in the highly desired Fitler Square neighborhood. Perfectly situated a block away from the Schuylkill (Taney) Park and just at the foot of the South Street bridge leading to UPenn, CHOP, and Drexel. There is not a better location to enjoy all the benefits of Center City, with the accessibility to University City.
The home features an open concept layout, with exposed brick and beams, as well as the ample lighting provided by the overhead skylight which catches your eye as you walk through the front door into the living room. Pass through the dining room as you enter the kitchen which has been completely updated with Stainless steel appliances, granite counter tops, maple cabinets, glass /slate backsplash, and a porcelain tile floor with radiant heating below, finished with a convenient granite breakfast bar. Off of the kitchen is a quaint rear outdoor area, ideal for a grilling and relaxing on your patio table. The entire home has been updated with dark hand-scraped maple hardwood floors, custom trim work and neutral yet classic freshly painted walls.
Go up the open staircase to the 2nd floor, which boasts the master bedroom complete with recessed lighting, ceiling fan and his/her California-style closets, as well as an additional storage closet. As well, there is a newly remodeled custom bathroom with enclosed glass shower including porcelain floor and wall tile and stone/glass mosaic accent wall. The exposed brick wall follows you up to the third floor which features another remodeled bathroom with full tub, as well as a bedroom with brick fireplace and a 3rd nice sized bedroom.
Truly unique to this home for this area of the city is the 400+sf finished basement. Use this area as an entertainment area, child’s play room, or office. This room features recessed lighting, wall to wall sculpted carpeting, HDMI hook-up, flatscreen mount, built in entertainment shelving, enclosed laundry area, and ample storage.
Convenient to Rittenhouse Square, UPenn, CHOP, Drexel, Fitler Square park, Taney Park, Graduate Hospital, Philadelphia Airport, and of course all of the restaurants, coffee shops, bars and overall neighborhood feel which makes Fitler Square one of the City’s most desirable neighborhoods.
Due with signing of the lease: First month’s rent, last month’s rent, 1 month security deposit

title: One Bedroom Apartment
description:
One Bed One Bath House Unit for rent On Pasadena One Bed One Bath Unit of about 700 sq. ft. available for rent. Very private, large 1 bedroom, 1 bath apt. with GOOD closet space. Great schools, tons of bike trails, shopping and parks close by. Unit has onsite coin-operated laundry machines available.
. . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .. . . . . . . . . . . . . . .
I am a 47 yo working professional going thru a divorce. Seeking to share a house/condo. Ideally would be nice to find one with RV parking as I have a 35’ toy hauler but I can leave it in its storage spot. I am an easy going and laid back guy, clean, don’t party but I enjoy being social on occasion.
Hi! I 33 M need a place by end of month for myself and my two cats. I work full time and am divorced with 3 kids. They live with mom, they won’t be staying with me. I have a gf but we don’t plan on living together for awhile. Credit is so so 700 ish. Im 420 friendly and work in cannabis industry. I don’t drink but don’t care if you do. Im laid back more introverted but can be social. Just want something chill and close by my kids. Quiet, pleasant, humorous...that's me! I'm about to turn 70 in July, and find myself looking for a new home because this one has been sold. I'm a semi-retired graphic artist who needs a space to turn into a home. My deadline here to move is July 25th. I am fully mobile with no physical restrictions, except for being 6'1...ha. Keep to myself but I'm friendly. My FICA score is 836. I have no debt. No evictions., smoking, pets, drums. Own a car. I have all my own teeth and furnishings. Will also take care of the yard. Love gardening. I'd prefer something like a studio, with enclosed bath, hopefully own entrance. I promise I'm a great tenant. Honest. My budget is about $995 including utilities. Definitely need wifi. No problem paying first/last or deposit. Of course I will verify that any ads I answer are real and not a scammer. All transactions in person. Thank you VERY much if you've read this far. Would love to hear from you. Hello! I’m a looking for a room in a house or an in-law suite for September 1, 2022 (or mid-August) for 1-year in a chill, earthy housing environment with like minded folks (prefer trans/nb, women) who appreciate community, connections, and peacefulness. I am a 30 year old non-binary femme starting a one-year graduate program at the University of Redlands on scholarship— moving from Portland, Oregon to California. When I’m not in class or in the lab/library studying, I am working full-time remote on renewable energy projects or involved with hobbies like foraging, bike packing/camping, and learning different trade skills. A little bit about what I’m looking for— *a room for rent or a mother-in-law suite from/with community-oriented people. Prefer women and non-binary/trans folxs. *allows one dog and you have pets of your own on the property. My Australian shepherd is beta, trained, and excellent with cats, dogs, farm animals, kids and humans alike. * I can provide multiple contacts for references for my dog and myself **preferably a garden, pets, and chickens I could tend to ** preferably furnished with a kitchen ** looking for one hour commute radius around Redlands I have very little time left and need to find a room to rent IMMEDIATELY this is now an emergency... im hoping a kind genuine soul will see this because I might not have a home by the end of today thanks to a two-faced lying toxic shady sociopath on here who said his name was Anthony in Chino Hills. Be careful everyone... And anybody kind that can help out in any way please contact me asap. Thank you for your time, be safe everyone Hello my name is Natalie Morales I am a 44-year-old looking to rent a room with a bathroom please no roommates I am in healthcare and I have no pets I don’t drink I don’t smoke I need immediate housing Single mother with one child looking for a house or apartment under $1300 in the city of San Bernardino. Preferably, a 2 bedroom in a quiet neighborhood. Yes, there are cheaper/affordable apartments available in SB, but the areas not so great and rowdy. Only reason I’m still looking for a place in the city of SB is because my daughter goes to a really good magnet school. Also, need a quiet neighborhood with not so much foot traffic and rowdy dogs as I am a professional who works from home. If you or anyone you know is renting a back house, single house, or apartment, please contact me via email with NAME, PHONE CONTACT, & PROPERTY INFO. I will give you a call. I don’t communicate through text or emails, so if you respond via email with no name and phone contact for me to call, don’t bother. Only reason I decided to post a wanted ad is because 80% of the ads on here are scams and scammers won’t meet or communicate over the phone. So everyone, beware. Looking to move at the end of July. Thank you for your time. We are looking for host families for the following dates: I am a 51 year old I am looking for a private room or a room shared with another . I have until July 16th to find another room to rent and move out, however my current roommate is a paranoid schizophrenic and is driving me crazy. If I move out earlier, my landlord will not care. I am currently disabled and on SSI. I have no pets, but I don't mind if you do. I do not drink, do drugs, or smoke. I have sleep apnea and a CPAP machine but might still snore, so my roommate should be okay with it. Shared bathroom is OK. I have dietary restrictions due to diabetes, so I do require kitchen privileges of some sort. I am quiet and will clean up after myself. Looking to rent a furnished room, $500 including utilities. Trying to stick to the Inland Empire (San Bernardino-Redlands-Loma Linda-Highland-Rialto-Yucaipa and adjoining areas) for housing as that's where I get my health services. Prefer housemates, but will consider f I don't share a room with them. The focal point of this home is its expansive living area that was completely reimagined by the current owners. The upgrades include a brand new kitchen island/dry bar area that has ample storage for all your entertaining needs as well as modifications to the living space to take advantage of its size, creating a true home. The windowed kitchen just off the dining area is perfectly situated between both bedrooms creating ideal separation of space and privacy. The thoughtfully renovated kitchen comes fully equipped with top of the line stainless steel appliances and is beautifully adorned with quartz countertops and tasteful modern tile backsplash. Adjoining the kitchen is the perk of a windowed powder room, which is set perfectly next to some additional storage captured during the renovation. Unwind after a long day in the oversized and airy primary bedroom with its own ensuite bath with full soaking tub. This room has two oversized windows allowing endless sunlight to pour in from its south and east exposures. A wall of custom built in closets maximizes the use of space. The second bedroom can double as a home office with a new custom closet that has been added. The two windows are a welcoming touch to this sunlit room. This unique, huge, corner 1 bedroom suite cant be missed. The living room, fully lined with windows on two sides looks out over the trees of Roslyn Road. Fabulously maintained details date back to the early 1900s, keeping the heritage feel of the building like you are in a time capsule. Best of all, this building is located in the heart of Osborne Village. Steps away from Winnipeg's most vibrant neighborhood, you have access to the best of Winnipeg's eclectic community.The basics like Safeway, Shoppers Drugmart and Shell are just steps away, yet all the adventure of famous restaurants, lounges and boutique shops are just around the corner.."
